channel.title: Notes of bvfnbk
channel.description: Recent content on Notes of bvfnbk

item.description: This page is part of a series describing the setup of a personal Github page using the Hugo static site generator. Part 1 : Installing Hugo Part 2 : Initialising a Site Part 3 : Create your First Post Part 4 : Serve Locally Part 5 : Setup Github Part 6 : Setup Continuous Deployment

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, This is my private space where I store my personal notes about technical topics, manuals and the current status of my current “pet projects”. Disclaimer The documents and articles found on this site are my personal notes and describe my personal opinion. Despite all due care and attention put into the compilation of the information, I cannot guarantee that all articles are correct and complete. Please use the information found here at your own risk.
